net.nicoulaj.instrument

Class AutoInstrumentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicoulaj.instrument.AutoInstrumentation

  • public class AutoInstrumentation
extends Object
    Provides transparent access to the Instrumentation API, without explicitly starting the application with an agent, attaching one at runtime or even implementing one.

    Disclaimer: This implementation is a proof of concept using several hacks that are not guaranteed to be consistent across systems and JVMs. Do not rely on it for production applications !

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Julien Nicoulaud
    See Also:
    API user entry point

        public static Instrumentation getInstrumentation()

      • agentmain

        public static void agentmain(String args,
             Instrumentation inst)
        Agent entry point.

        This method is not meant to be used directly, see getInstrumentation().

        Parameters:
        args - agent arguments, unused
        inst - instrument object
